questions.question_text: You are the program manager for your organization. Your program has recently completed its program scope and you've transferred the benefits to the operations of your organization. Before your program is considered closed you must complete some forms and procedures as required by your organization. The requirements to complete the forms and paperwork are also known as what?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Closing Processes: This is the most appropriate choice. It encompasses the entire range of activities required to formally close a program, which includes completing necessary documentation and procedures, as well as the tasks mentioned in your description like administrative closure, archiving documents, lessons learned, and transferring ongoing activities. It's a comprehensive term that covers all aspects of bringing a program to its formal conclusion.
Answer needs to be C - EEF has nothing to do with the closing
